What warranty does a smartphone come with?
Smartphones typically come with a one-year limited warranty covering manufacturer defects. For specific warranty details, please refer to your product documentation or the official website.

No, not all apps are available on both iOS and Android. Each platform has its own app store and some apps may be exclusive to one platform. Please check the respective app stores for availability.
